column5: Does anyone have a line on the monster corn that used to be available from Steven at New World Carp 12 to 13 years ago? Or does any know of a supplier of monster corn, even the zoom xxl corn would surffice?
Worse case scenario is find Peruvian corn kernels, that is what that corn is, soak it and flavour accordingly….I believe I’ve found articles on line for that.  ‘’Really miss Steven and NWC
